name.ja: <ruby>絢<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>嵐<rt>らん</rt></ruby>たる<ruby>見<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby>

text.en:
Activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of "Magnifistorming Sight Trance" once per turn);
● Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 "Magnifistorm" card or 1 Quick-Play Spell, or, if you do not have any in your hand, discard your entire hand.
● Add 1 "Mystical Space Typhoon" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
If this card is destroyed by the effect of "Mystical Space Typhoon": You can Set this card.
